message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While $6,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $10,000.  I think this product will really benefit you and I want to find a price that works for us both.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $10,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Can you meet me at that price?
